00037 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 // Function: DiagramColumn()
00039 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 DiagramColumn::DiagramColumn(QString const& name, ColumnContentType contentType,
00041                              unsigned int allowedItems, DiagramColumnLayout* layout) :
00042     QGraphicsRectItem(), layout_(layout), name_(), width_(0),
00043     contentType_(contentType), allowedItems_(CIT_NONE), nameLabel_(0), oldPos_(), conns_()
00044 {
00045     setFlag(ItemIsMovable);
00046     setFlag(ItemIsSelectable);
00047     setFlag(ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00048     setBrush(QBrush(QColor(210, 210, 210)));
00049     setPen(QPen(Qt::black, 1));
00050 
00051     // Update the name label.
00052     nameLabel_ = new QGraphicsTextItem(this);
00053     QFont font = nameLabel_->font();
00054     font.setBold(true);
00055     nameLabel_->setFont(font);
00056     setName(name);
00057 
00058     setContentType(contentType, allowedItems);
00059 }

00068 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 // Function: setName()
00070 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 void DiagramColumn::setName(QString const& name)
00072 {
00073     nameLabel_->setHtml("<center>" + name + "</center>");
00074     nameLabel_->setTextWidth(std::max<unsigned int>(140, width_));
00075     nameLabel_->setPos((width_ - nameLabel_->textWidth()) / 2.0, 5.0);
00076 
00077     name_ = name;
00078     emit contentChanged();
00079 }

00086     return isItemAllowed(item, allowedItems_);

00089 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 // Function: addItem()
00091 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 void DiagramColumn::addItem(QGraphicsItem* item, bool load)
00093 {
00094     // Remove the item from the previous column.
00095     if (item->parentItem() != 0)
00096     {
00097         static_cast<DiagramColumn*>(item->parentItem())->removeItem(item);
00098     }
00099 
00100     // Map the position to the column's local coordinate system
00101     // and constrain the item to the horizontal center of the column.
00102     QPointF pos = mapFromScene(item->scenePos());
00103     pos.setX(width_ / 2.0);
00104 
00105     item->setPos(pos);
00106     item->setFlag(ItemStacksBehindParent);
00107 
00108     // Set the column as the parent of the item.
00109     item->setParentItem(this);
00110 
00111     if (load)
00112     {
00113         // Place the item at the correct index in the items list.
00114         for (int i = 0; i < items_.size(); ++i)
00115         {
00116             if (item->y() < items_.at(i)->y())
00117             {
00118                 items_.insert(i, item);
00119                 return;
00120             }
00121         }
00122 
00123         // If we got here, the item must be placed at the end of the list.
00124         items_.append(item);
00125     }
00126     else
00127     {
00128         items_.append(item);
00129 
00130         if (contentType_ == COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
00131         {
00132             VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove(items_, item, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, IO_SPACING);
00133             VCollisionLayout::setItemPos(items_, item, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, IO_SPACING);
00134         }
00135         else
00136         {
00137             VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(items_, item, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00138             VStackedLayout::setItemPos(items_, item, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00139         }
00140     }
00141 
00142     emit contentChanged();
00143 }
00144 
00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 // Function: removeItem()
00147 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 void DiagramColumn::removeItem(QGraphicsItem* item)
00149 {
00150     items_.removeAll(item);
00151     setParentItem(0);
00152 
00153     if (contentType_ != COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
00154     {
00155         VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(items_, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00156     }
00157 
00158     emit contentChanged();
00159 }

00161 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 // Function: setOffsetY()
00163 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 void DiagramColumn::setOffsetY(qreal y)
00165 {
00166     // Update the rectangle and the label position.
00167     setRect(0, y, width_, HEIGHT);
00168     nameLabel_->setPos(nameLabel_->x(), 5 + y);
00169 }

00171 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 // Function: mouseMoveEvent()
00173 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00174 void DiagramColumn::mouseMoveEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00175 {
00176     // Discard mouse move if the diagram is protected.
00177     if (static_cast<BlockDiagram*>(scene())->isProtected())
00178     {
00179         return;
00180     }
00181 
00182     QGraphicsRectItem::mouseMoveEvent(event);
00183 
00184     setZValue(1001.0);
00185     layout_->onMoveColumn(this);
00186 }
00187 
00188 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00189 // Function: mouseReleaseEvent()
00190 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00191 void DiagramColumn::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* event)
00192 {
00193     QGraphicsRectItem::mouseReleaseEvent(event);
00194 
00195     setZValue(0.0);
00196     layout_->onReleaseColumn(this);
00197 
00198     // Create an undo command only if the position really changed.
00199     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> cmd;
00200 
00201     if (pos() != oldPos_)
00202     {
00203         cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new ColumnMoveCommand(layout_, this, oldPos_));
00204     }
00205     else
00206     {
00207         cmd = QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand>(new QUndoCommand());
00208     }
00209 
00210     // End position update for the interconnections.
00211     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, conns_)
00212     {
00213         conn->endUpdatePosition(cmd.data());
00214     }
00215 
00216     conns_.clear();
00217 
00218     if (cmd->childCount() > 0 || pos() != oldPos_)
00219     {
00220         layout_->getEditProvider().addCommand(cmd);
00221         emit contentChanged();
00222     }
00223 }
00224 
00225 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 // Function: onMoveItem()
00227 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00228 void DiagramColumn::onMoveItem(QGraphicsItem* item, DiagramColumn* oldColumn)
00229 {
00230     // Determine the column under the item's current position.
00231     DiagramColumn* column = layout_->findColumnAt(item->scenePos());
00232 
00233     // Check if item cannot be placed into the column.
00234     if (column != 0 && !column->isItemAllowed(item))
00235     {
00236         // Place to the old column instead.
00237         column = oldColumn;
00238     }
00239 
00240     // Check if the column is different than the current one.
00241     if (column != 0 && column != this)
00242     {
00243         // We have to switch the column and update this column's item positions
00244         // without the moving item.
00245         items_.removeAll(item);
00246         
00247         QPointF newPos = column->mapFromScene(item->scenePos());
00248         item->setParentItem(column);
00249         item->setPos(newPos);
00250 
00251         if (contentType_ != COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
00252         {
00253             VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(items_, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00254         }
00255 
00256         setZValue(0.0);
00257 
00258         // And call the new column's onMoveItem().
00259         column->onMoveItem(item, oldColumn);
00260         return;
00261     }
00262 
00263     setZValue(1001.0);
00264 
00265     // Restrict the position so that the item cannot be placed too high.
00266     item->setPos(snapPointToGrid(item->x(), std::max(MIN_Y_PLACEMENT - item->boundingRect().top(), item->y())));
00267 
00268     if (contentType_ == COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
00269     {
00270         VCollisionLayout::updateItemMove(items_, item, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, IO_SPACING);
00271     }
00272     else
00273     {
00274         VStackedLayout::updateItemMove(items_, item, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00275     }
00276 }
00277 
00278 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00279 // Function: onReleaseItem()
00280 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00281 void DiagramColumn::onReleaseItem(QGraphicsItem* item)
00282 {
00283     setZValue(0.0);
00284 
00285     if (contentType_ == COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
00286     {
00287         VCollisionLayout::setItemPos(items_, item, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, IO_SPACING);
00288     }
00289     else
00290     {
00291         VStackedLayout::setItemPos(items_, item, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00292     }
00293 }

00295 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00296 // Function: updateItemPositions()
00297 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00298 void DiagramColumn::updateItemPositions()
00299 {
00300     // Just update the item positions.
00301     if (contentType_ != COLUMN_CONTENT_IO)
00302     {
00303         VStackedLayout::updateItemPositions(items_, width_ / 2, MIN_Y_PLACEMENT, SPACING);
00304     }
00305 }

00323 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00324 // Function: setContentType()
00325 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00326 void DiagramColumn::setContentType(ColumnContentType type, unsigned int allowedItems)
00327 {
00328     contentType_ = type;
00329 
00330     switch (type)
00331     {
00332     case COLUMN_CONTENT_IO:
00333         {
00334             allowedItems_ = CIT_INTERFACE;
00335             break;
00336         }
00337 
00338     case COLUMN_CONTENT_COMPONENTS:
00339         {
00340             allowedItems_ = CIT_COMPONENT;
00341             break;
00342         }
00343 
00344     case COLUMN_CONTENT_BUSES:
00345         {
00346             allowedItems_ = CIT_CHANNEL | CIT_BRIDGE;
00347             break;
00348         }
00349 
00350     case COLUMN_CONTENT_CUSTOM:
00351         {
00352             allowedItems_ = allowedItems;
00353             break;
00354         }
00355     }
00356 
00357     // Update the width based on the content type.
00358     width_ = 259;
00359 
00360     if (allowedItems_ == CIT_INTERFACE)
00361     {
00362         width_ = 119;
00363     }
00364 
00365     setRect(0, 0, width_, HEIGHT);
00366     nameLabel_->setPos((width_ - nameLabel_->textWidth()) / 2.0, 5.0);
00367     layout_->updateColumnPositions();
00368 
00369     emit contentChanged();
00370 }

00376 {

00380 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00381 // Function: isAllowedItemsValid()
00382 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00383 bool DiagramColumn::isAllowedItemsValid(unsigned int allowedItems) const
00384 {
00385     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items_)
00386     {
00387         if (!isItemAllowed(item, allowedItems))
00388         {
00389             return false;
00390         }
00391     }
00392 
00393     return true;
00394 }

00396 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00397 // Function: isEmpty()
00398 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00399 bool DiagramColumn::isEmpty() const
00400 {
00401     return items_.empty();
00402 }
00403 
00404 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00405 // Function: isItemAllowed()
00406 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00407 bool DiagramColumn::isItemAllowed(QGraphicsItem* item, unsigned int allowedItems) const
00408 {
00409     switch (item->type())
00410     {
00411     case DiagramInterface::Type:
00412         {
00413             return (allowedItems & CIT_INTERFACE);
00414         }
00415 
00416     case DiagramComponent::Type:
00417         {
00418             QSharedPointer<Component> comp = qgraphicsitem_cast<DiagramComponent*>(item)->componentModel();
00419 
00420             // Check if this is a packaged component (and has a strict type).
00421             if (comp->getVlnv()->isValid())
00422             {
00423                 return ((comp->isBridge() && (allowedItems & CIT_BRIDGE)) ||
00424                     (comp->isChannel() && (allowedItems & CIT_CHANNEL)) ||
00425                     (!comp->isBus() && (allowedItems & CIT_COMPONENT)));
00426             }
00427             else
00428             {
00429                 // Otherwise this is an unpacked component and can of any type.
00430                 return (allowedItems & (CIT_BRIDGE | CIT_CHANNEL | CIT_COMPONENT));
00431             }
00432         }
00433     }
00434 
00435     return false;
00436 }
00437 
00438 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00439 // Function: itemChange()
00440 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00441 QVariant DiagramColumn::itemChange(GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant &value)
00442 {
00443     switch (change)
00444     {
00445     case ItemPositionChange:
00446         {
00447             return QPointF(value.toPointF().x(), 0.0);
00448         }
00449     }
00450 
00451     return QGraphicsRectItem::itemChange(change, value);
00452 }

00454 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00455 // Function: mousePressEvent()
00456 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00457 void DiagramColumn::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent *event)
00458 {
00459     QGraphicsRectItem::mousePressEvent(event);
00460 
00461     oldPos_ = pos();
00462 
00463     // Begin position update for the interconnections.
00464     foreach (QGraphicsItem* item, items_)
00465     {
00466         if (item->type() == DiagramComponent::Type)
00467         {
00468             DiagramComponent* comp = static_cast<DiagramComponent*>(item);
00469 
00470             foreach (QGraphicsItem* childItem, comp->childItems())
00471             {
00472                 if (childItem->type() == DiagramPort::Type)
00473                 {
00474                     beginUpdateConnPositions(static_cast<DiagramConnectionEndPoint*>(childItem));
00475                 }
00476             }
00477         }
00478         else if (item->type() == DiagramInterface::Type)
00479         {
00480             beginUpdateConnPositions(static_cast<DiagramConnectionEndPoint*>(item));
00481         }
00482     }
00483 }

00493 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00494 // Function: beginUpdateConnPositions()
00495 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00496 void DiagramColumn::beginUpdateConnPositions(DiagramConnectionEndPoint* endPoint)
00497 {
00498     foreach (DiagramInterconnection* conn, endPoint->getInterconnections())
00499     {
00500         if (!conns_.contains(conn))
00501         {
00502             conn->beginUpdatePosition();
00503             conns_.insert(conn);
00504         }
00505     }
00506 }
